source.961015b9:
def col_num(df,column_name):#to count  survey results.
    k=cc(df,column_name + ".+")
    data=[]
    count=[]
    per=[]
    for i in range(1,k):
        data_count=(df[column_name + "Part_"+ "{}".format(i)].value_counts())
        data.append(data_count.index[0])
        count.append(data_count.values[0])
    other=df[column_name+"OTHER"].value_counts()
    data.append(other.index[0])
    count.append(other.values[0])
    for i in count:
        k=(np.round_((i/sum(count))*100,2))
        per.append(k)
    return data,count,per

    usaper.append(np.round_((i/sum(usa_order))*100,2))
for i in indiasal.values:
    indiaper.append(np.round_((i/sum(india_order))*100,2))

    
qst_data,qst_count=usasal.index,usaper
qsd_data,qsd_count=indiasal.index,indiaper


fig = plt.figure(
    FigureClass=Waffle, 
    rows=10, 
    values=qst_count,
    labels=list(qst_data),
    figsize=(8, 8),
    characters='⬤',
    title={
        'label': 'Gender distribution of respondents in USA',
        'loc': 'center',
        'fontdict': {
            'fontsize': 20
        }
    },
    block_arranging_style='snake',
    colors=["#3C3B6E", "#B22234", "#004dff","#750787","#FFED00"],
    legend={
        'loc': 'lower left',
        'bbox_to_anchor': (-0.3, -0.2),
        'ncol': len(qsd_data),
        'framealpha': 0,
        'fontsize': 12
    }
    
)

source.f9ed58fb:
The chart illustrates the Age group distribution of USA and INDIA kaggle-survey-2020 respondents in percentages. 

Overall,The Indian kaggle survey respondents are more compared to USA kaggle survey respondents. The age group distribution of Indian respondents is right skewed with around 35% of respondents are at 18-21 years and 0.22% of respondents belong to 60-69 years age group. The age group distribution of american respondents doesn't follow any standard distribution.

Around 18% of respondents belong to 25-29 years age group in both countries. In USA, the percentage of respondents that belong to 30-34 are double than that of Indian responents which was 9%.Approximately 80% of respondents are between 18-29 years age group in INDIA.
source.a2b4dac9: ## Let us delve into salaries of the 18% doctrol degree respondents of USA.
source.99a57bd6: It is clear from the visualizations that there is clear **gender inequality** among respondents of both the countries.
source.5d604204: Above 18% of USA respondents received **Doctoral degree** which was approximately 4 times more than Indian respondents. About 47% Respondents in USA received Master's degree on this as opposed to Indian respondents at 32.33%. On the contrary,52.84%  Indian respondents received Bachelor's degree than american respondents at 25.75%.
